Package gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.hibernate

This package contains Hibernate support for Bo2.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
HibernateSessionProvider Provider of a Hibernate session.
 

Class Summary
AbstractCriteriaQuery<P> AbstractCriteriaQuery is an implementation of EntitiesQuery based on hibernate.
AbstractHibernateDetachStrategy Base Hibernate DetachStrategy implementation.
AbstractHibernatePersistenceUtility<P> Implementation of PersistenceUtility based on Hibernate.
AbstractHibernateQuery<P> Abstract implementation of EntitiesQuery based on Hibernate.
AbstractHibernateWorker Abstract base class for workers implementation with Hibernate.
AbstractHqlQuery<P> Abstract implementation of AbstractHibernateQuery based on HQL.
Bo2ImplHibernateInitializer Initialization of environment.
GenericHibernatePersistenceUtility<P> Generic Hibernate Persistence Utility.
GenericHibernatePersistenceWorker<P extends PersistentObject<?>> Implementation of PersistenceWorker based on Hibernate.
HibernateBo2Utils Utility class for Hibernate support.
HibernateConfigurations This class manages all hibernate configurations and their SessionFactory objects.
HibernateDetachStrategy Default Hibernate detach strategy for working objects.
HibernateReadOnlyDetachStrategy Hibernate detach strategy for objects we want to treat as read-only.
HibernateSessionProviderImpl Implementation ofHibernateSessionProvider that will load a hibernate.cfg.xml and a set of hibernate mapping files and will create a static SessionFactory in order to provide Sessions.
PersistenceWorkerFactoryImpl Implementation of PersistenceWorkerFactory.
RefreshMode Defines in which cases an object persisted by a PersistenceUtility is being refreshed from the database.
SmallTableLoaderQuery<P> SmallTableLoaderQuery is designed to query small tables and return all their data.
TransientEntitiesReattacher<P extends PersistentObject<?>> Deprecated. There is now a unified re-attacching mechanism for both transient and detached instances.
 

Enum Summary
FlushStrategy Defines the flush policy for a session.
 

Package gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.hibernate Description

This package contains Hibernate support for Bo2.
